wikipedia_page.main: Albert Brayley (born 5 September 1981) is an English footballer who plays as a striker for Basildon United. Brayley played in the Football League with Swindon Town in the 2001–02 season before dropping into non-League football.

response: Bertie Brayley has just made his first appearances for his 40th club. Template only allows for 39 and thus is not displaying the info for the 40th club. Please expand to allow for >39 clubs. Thanks.--Egghead06 (talk) 08:01, 23 March 2016 (UTC)
